name: East Legon
detail: One of the most affluent and upscale residential areas in Accra, known for its high-end shopping centers, restaurants, and gated communities.

name: Osu
detail: A bustling and cosmopolitan community, known for its lively nightlife, trendy restaurants, and the historic Osu Castle.

name: Labone
detail: A quiet and upscale residential area, popular with expatriates and diplomats, featuring large homes and well-manicured gardens.

name: Tema
detail: A planned city located about 25 kilometers east of Accra, developed as an industrial hub and home to several residential neighborhoods.

name: Madina
detail: A rapidly growing suburb, characterized by a mix of residential areas, markets, and commercial developments.

name: Airport Residential Area
detail: An upscale residential community located near Kotoka International Airport, known for its large, luxurious homes and the presence of many diplomatic missions and international organizations.
